header.title: My Developer Lab
header.subtitle: Your personalized toolkit for maximum productivity

sidebar.starToolsToAdd: Star tools to add them here

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Lab!
welcome.description: This is your personal workspace where you can access your favorite tools and categories quickly.
welcome.howItWorksDescription: Mark any tool or category with a ⭐ to add it here.
welcome.privacyDescription: We don't know who you are, nor do we care. All your preferences stay in your browser's local storage. No accounts, no tracking, just tools.

empty.title: Your Lab is Empty!
empty.description: Start by marking your favorite tools and categories with a
empty.tip1: Click the star on any tool card to add it to your Lab
empty.tip2: Mark entire categories as favorites for quick access
empty.tip3: Everything stays private in your browser - no accounts needed
empty.headerSubtitle: Streamline your workflow with curated tools and instant access
empty.headerTagline: Curate your favorite tools for instant access and streamlined workflows
empty.headerDescription: Build your personalized toolkit by starring tools across ToolsLab. Your Lab stays completely private - all data stored locally in your browser with no account required.
empty.introDescription: Your Personal Lab is a curated workspace where you can star your most-used developer tools for instant access. From encoding utilities to security tools, build your personalized toolkit that evolves with your workflow. Everything stays private in your browser with no account required.
empty.mainDescription: Start building your personalized developer toolkit by starring tools with a ⭐ to add them here.
empty.proTip1: Click the star on any tool card to add it to your personal collection
empty.proTip2: Star entire categories for quick access to related tools
empty.proTip3: Everything stays completely private - stored locally in your browser with zero tracking
empty.seoTitle: Why Create a Personal Developer Lab?
empty.seoIntro: Your Personal Lab transforms scattered tool usage into an organized, efficient workflow. By curating your favorite tools, you eliminate the time spent searching and create muscle memory for your most common development tasks.
empty.privacyControlDescription: Everything in your Lab is stored locally using browser localStorage. No accounts, no tracking, no server-side storage. Your workflow preferences stay completely private and under your control.
empty.workflowOptimizationDescription: Star frequently-used tools like our JSON Formatter, Base64 Encoder, and security utilities to build workflows that match your development patterns.
empty.needMoreToolsDescription: Explore our complete collection of developer tools across all categories. Find the perfect tool for your workflow and add it to your Lab.
